name: Journey Through Enceladus
description:
Journey Through Enceladus is the third Build a Game project created from suggestions submitted by viewers like you. This procedurally-generated spelunking game involves a submarine diving into the depths of Enceladus, one of Saturn's moons, in search of life. What lives deeper into this mysterious waters?

Source for this game is available on GitHub:

github.com/TechValleyGameSpace/Build-A-Game-3

The livestream of us building the game is available below:
